sourcesContent:
import { Container } from '../../style'; const MarketingNotificationForClasses = () => { return (

Email

Schedule

We send email notifications to parents every XXX that gives them an outline of the schedule of their classes for the week.

New Classes

Newly published classes are also sent via email to the parents and learners every XXX.

Others

We also send email notifications to parents and learners about new classes occasionally depending on various factors such as relevance, popularity, supply, etc.

Please note that we carefully curate the lists of classes that you will be getting in your emails. Here are some of our guidelines on which classes end up on your timeline.

  • Only classes that match the learner’s age and parents’ preferences will be included in the email notifications. You can change this in your account settings.
  • If there are too many relevant classes, we will randomly pick from them.

 

Other Social Media Accounts

We will also be posting announcements and promotions on our social media platforms primarily Facebook and YouTube. The posts will be about the following:

  • Stories of overseas and Philippine-based teachers
  • Stories and testimonies of Tagpros parents
  • What is Tagpros and its platform
  • Teacher partnership programs
  • Partnered School Districts
  • New courses
 ); }; export default MarketingNotificationForClasses;
